description: Source code for an Angular service 'RecipeService' that provides in-memory mock data and methods to retrieve recipes, potentially to be replaced with real API calls in the future.

classes.name: RecipeService
classes.description: An Angular service that supplies recipe data, currently with in-memory mock data and placeholders for API integration.

methods.name: getRecipes
methods.description: Returns an observable of all recipes, currently from in-memory mock data.

methods.name: getRecipe
methods.description: Returns an observable of a single recipe identified by its id, from in-memory mock data.
